meta.title: B&B Vita Nova - Groups
meta.description: B&B Vita Nova can also be rented as a group accommodation. A unique place in Amersfoort to spend time with your friends, family or colleagues.

groups.heading: Groups
groups.body1: Are you looking for a unique location in the center of Amersfoort to host a group? Our boat is perfect for your party. Experience the intimacy and privacy of a gathering spot on the water.
groups.body2: The entire ship is yours and in the atmospheric public area there is enough space to have a drink together or play a game. Sleep in a ship's cabin, the sailor's cabin or the skipper's house, all of which have their own sanitary facilities. You can prepare your own meals in the well-equipped kitchen.

info.heading: Options and pricing
info.groupSize: The ship can accommodate a group of 10 to 15 people:
info.groupSizeLi1: From 1 November to 31 March there is room for a group of up to 12 people*.
info.groupSizeLi2: From 1 April to 31 October there is room for a group of up to 15 people.
info.rentShip: You can rent the ship from 2 nights. This is possible from â‚¬ 1495. Please contact us for more information. If you rent the ship, the following is included:

features.bedLinen: Bed linen and towels, shampoo/shower gel, toilet paper and kitchen linen
features.coffee: Unlimited access to delicious coffee from Boot Koffie and tea from Clipper
features.music: Access to the Sonos wireless music system to play your personal music
features.games: A wide range of games, magazines and the Volkskrant
features.location: A perfect base within walking distance of the city center and public transport

info.activities: We are also happy to think along with you about fun group activities or catering on board for an unforgettable time together!
info.footnote: * From 1 November to 31 March the sailor's cabin is closed, because it gets a bit colder here in the winter. In consultation, the sailor's cabin can be rented during this period.
